basic.name: Fel Claws (Q)
basic.description: Violently slash in the chosen direction, dealing 66 damage to enemies.Reactivate to slash up to 2 more times. The third slash Stuns enemies for 0.75 seconds.

basic.name: Necrotic Embrace (W)
basic.description: Desecrate the air, dealing 110 damage to nearby enemies and gaining 25 Armor for 3 seconds.

basic.name: Night Rush (E)
basic.description: After 0.75 seconds, gain 50% Movement Speed for 2 seconds. While active, Mal'Ganis can move through enemy Heroes and put them to Sleep for 2.5 seconds.

heroic.name: Carrion Swarm (R)
heroic.description: After 1 second, disperse into an Invulnerable swarm of bats for 3 seconds, dealing 120 damage per second to enemies.Vampiric Touch heals for 75% of Carrion Swarm's damage to Heroes.

heroic.name: Dark Conversion (R)
heroic.description: Channel on an enemy Hero for 0.75 seconds, then swap Health percentages with the target over 3 seconds.

trait.name: Vampiric Touch (T)
trait.description: Mal'Ganis heals for 45% of damage dealt to enemy Heroes and 10% of damage dealt to non-Heroes.

1.name: Winged Guard
1.description: Each time Necrotic Embrace hits an enemy Hero, gain 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack.If Winged Guard has no charges, Mal'Ganis will gain 1 charge after 6 seconds.

1.name: Vampiric Aura
1.description: Mal'Ganis heals for 30% of Physical Damage dealt, and nearby allied Heroes heal for 15% of Physical Damage dealt.

1.name: Time to Feed
1.description: Mal'Ganis heals for 70 when damaging a nearby enemy Hero. This can occur once every 6 seconds against each enemy Hero, but is also refreshed when they are Slept by Night Rush.

4.name: Fueled by Torment
4.description: While Necrotic Embrace is active, Mal'Ganis heals for 12 when damage is taken and Vampiric Touch converts 20% more Hero damage into healing.

4.name: Might of Sargeras
4.description: Necrotic Embrace's Armor is increased to 50.

4.name: Echo of Doom
4.description: When Necrotic Embrace expires, it explodes again for 68 damage.  For each enemy Hero hit, gain 5 Mana and reduce the cooldown of Necrotic Embrace by 0.75 seconds.Does not wake Sleeping targets.

7.name: Black Claws
7.description: After Mal'Ganis hits an enemy Hero with Fel Claws, his next Basic Attack deals 60% more damage and reduces the Armor of enemy Heroes by 15 for 2 seconds.

7.name: Will of Tichondrius
7.description: Each enemy Hero hit by the first 2 slashes of Fel Claws causes the final slash to steal 1% of maximum Health from enemy Heroes, up to 4%.If at least 4 enemy Heroes are hit with the first 2 slashes of Fel Claws, then the final slash Stuns enemies for an additional 0.5 seconds.

7.name: Spreading Plague
7.description: After casting Night Rush, deal 33 damage per second to nearby enemies.  This effect lasts for 5 seconds and Basic Attacks against Heroes refresh its duration.Does not wake Sleeping targets.

10.name: Carrion Swarm
10.description: After 1 second, disperse into an Invulnerable swarm of bats for 3 seconds, dealing 120 damage per second to enemies.Vampiric Touch heals for 75% of Carrion Swarm's damage to Heroes.

10.name: Dark Conversion
10.description: Channel on an enemy Hero for 0.75 seconds, then swap Health percentages with the target over 3 seconds.

13.name: Deep Sleep
13.description: Increase Night Rush's Sleep duration by 0.75 seconds and its Movement Speed bonus by 10%.

13.name: The Night Beckons
13.description: Basic Attacks deal 200% bonus damage to Sleeping enemies.  After Night Rush's Sleep ends, targets are Slowed by 30% for 3 seconds.

13.name: Blood Rush
13.description: When Mal'Ganis is healed by a Hero, he gains 1% Movement Speed for 6 seconds, up to 15%.

16.name: Plague Bats
16.description: Necrotic Embrace unleashes a wave of bats in front of Mal'Ganis, dealing 81 damage.

16.name: Frenzied Assault
16.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes with a higher Health percentage heal for an additional 50% of damage dealt.Basic Attacks against Heroes with a lower Health percentage grant 35% Attack Speed for 3 seconds.

16.name: Blind as a Bat
16.description: Activate to erupt with blind rage, removing the cooldown and Mana cost of Fel Claws, but losing all vision. Lasts 6 seconds.  Enemy Heroes hit by the final slash of Fel Claws reduces the cooldown of this Ability by 4 seconds.

20.name: Seeker Swarm
20.description: Upon expiring, Carrion Swarm's bats seek nearby enemy Heroes, dealing 132 damage and Sleeping them for 2.5 seconds.

20.name: Wrath of Nathreza
20.description: Enemy Heroes near the target suffer 75% of the transferred Health as damage over 3 seconds.Does not benefit from Vampiric Touch.

20.name: Vanquish the Weak
20.description: Damage from Fel Claws and Basic Attacks Slows enemies by 25% for 1.5 seconds, and Vampiric Touch converts 10% more damage into healing versus Slowed Heroes.

20.name: Alone in the Dark
20.description: Reduce the cooldown of Night Rush by 4 seconds.  Enemy Heroes put to Sleep by Night Rush have their vision greatly reduced during the Sleep and for 2 seconds after.
